nodes.excerpt: Hi Product Hunt! I'm Dmitriy, the maker of Noizer. I would love to introduce you to my small project - Noizer. An app, where you can listen to ambient sounds. It's inspired by Noisli project, but 100% free.
nodes.title: Noizer - Ambient sounds like Noisli, but free
nodes.author: Dmitriy Malakhov

nodes.excerpt: not less but better is the digital wellbeing app that helps you become resilient to digital distraction. Learn healthy phone use with 5 minutes of practice a day and feel in control again. Developed by psychologists, backed by science, and proven to work.
nodes.title: not less but better - Build healthy phone habits with 5 minutes a day ğŸ˜Œ
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Salut is a creator platform for fitness pros. We make it fun and easy for fitness creators to build and monetize a community. Schedule, stream, socialize, and monetize virtual fitness content - all in one app for free.
nodes.title: Salut - The creator platform for fitness
nodes.author: Justin Mitchell

nodes.excerpt: breakthru is a curated list of 40+ self-care tools & resources. It's not easy to find mental health solutions on the internet. Spend less time searching and more time working on your mental well being by trying out apps, podcasts, newsletters on breakthru.
nodes.title: breakthru - Curated apps & resources for your mental health
nodes.author: Josselin Colletta

nodes.excerpt: Actuflow is a super simple app, that may change the way you use your phone. The app is for defining intentions before using phone or concrete apps. This is literally all that the app does. This tiny trick may make your device usage more mindful.
nodes.title: Actuflow 3.0 - App for checking why you use your smartphone before using it
nodes.author: Yaroslav Neznaradko (yarsanich)

nodes.excerpt: Sleep Formula is your personal sleep assistant that counts your sleep cycles and tracks your sleep. Wake up bright-eyed and bushy-tailed at ANY time even if you stay up late! Analyze your sleep and build healthy habits! Let's do it together!
nodes.title: Sleep Formula - App to improve your sleep using CBT & sleep tracker
nodes.author: Aleksandr Lanin

nodes.excerpt: purME Air is a powered mask that makes breathing safer and easier. Breathe only filtered air supplied by twin turbines. Block out 99.5% of microorganisms with FFP1, N95 and P100 filters. Sterilize your mask in under 5 minutes with a built-in UV-C unit.
nodes.title: purME Air - Face mask that makes your breathing super safe and easy
nodes.author: Norayr Margarian

nodes.excerpt: Happy Things is here to help you live a happier life! With hundreds of small, diverse daily activities, the mobile app guides and motivates you to do one thing each day to boost your happiness.
nodes.title: Happy Things - Simple, daily activities to increase your happiness
nodes.author: Talia Soen

nodes.excerpt: Zealth is building a software to help hospitals provide continuous round the clock monitoring to their cancer patients, once they leave the hospital and alerts them if the patient is at high risk.
nodes.title: Zealth - SaaS for remote monitoring of cancer patients
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Best10 offers unrivalled daily support at your fingertips and in the comfort of your own home. Receive daily checkins with your certified coach, a 100% personalised workout and eating plan, complete with shopping lists and recipes.
nodes.title: Best10 - 100% personalised workouts, eating plan & a certified coach.
nodes.author: Mike Metelerkamp

nodes.excerpt: BCPRO.APP is a free research-based online tool that uses genetic factors to analyze a personâ€™s risk of developing a severe case of COVIDâ€“19. â € We score your 23andMe, Ancestry, or MyHeritage raw data, and turn the insights into a report in less than 1 minute.
nodes.title: BCPRO.APP - Kick COVID using your DNA dataâ€¦ before it kicks you
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Cadoo is the most intense way to reach your fitness goals. â € Browse challenges, commit to a fitness goal, use a fitness tracker to track your progress. Winners get their money back + extra money from the challenge losers.
nodes.title: Cadoo - Your running drill coach that motivates you with money
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Terapify is a video chat platform that connects people who need psychological help with vetted psychotherapists who share their culture and language in an easy, secure and affordable way.
nodes.title: Terapify - Online therapy platform for Spanish-speaking people
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Tasterboxes are packed full of nutritious new treats straight from our favorite startups. Are your tastebuds ready to discover their next favorite foods? Each box is curated for your dietary needs. Vegan? GF, low carb? No problem. Find your perfect https://tastermonial.com/pages/tasterbox-quiz
nodes.title: Tasterbox - Curated food box for your palate + your gut
nodes.author: Catherine Work

nodes.excerpt: Charge Running is a mobile app that provides live running classes with others from all over the world! Trainers will update you on your stats and interact with you and your fellow runners in our real-time chat room.
nodes.title: Charge Running - Social running app with real-time coaching
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Life is a magical journey; why not getting some souvenirs out of it? 1. Open the app. 2. Write down 3 things you are thankful for that day. 3. That's it! We are working on exciting features. Have fun with the innovative Souvenir gratitude tracker app!
nodes.title: Souvenir - A gratitude journal to track the good in your life
nodes.author: John Caffier

nodes.excerpt: Waterful is a fresh take on water reminder apps. With multiple healthy challenges to take, friendly notifications to follow & our cute octopus to keep you company, staying hydrated becomes fun.
nodes.title: Waterful - Turn daily hydration into a fun habit
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Rejoy Health is a subscription service for the 20M people with Thyroid Disorder in the US. Rejoy Health members pay a monthly fee for treatment, symptom management & lifestyle coaching.
nodes.title: Rejoy Health - Digital clinic to treat and manage thyroid disorders
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Hard to know if a product contains gluten ? Scan it ! Share your recipes & discover content
nodes.title: Gluten Scan - Scan a product and get its gluten presence
nodes.author: SÃ©bastien

nodes.excerpt: DBT Pal is the easiest, fastest and most intuitive way to track and manage your weekly DBT diary card. Daily tracking of your urges & emotions, journaling, paced breathing exercise & guided meditations, daily reminders & export to therapist.
nodes.title: DBT Pal - Track urges, emotions guided breathing & therapist export
nodes.author: Ben Fox

nodes.excerpt: Lullaby helps treat Tinnitus, a condition that makes you hear a very annoying sound for the rest of your life. Most of the ENTs I checked with seemed poorly prepared to help their patients with the stress, so the app teaches you a healthy way to do that.
nodes.title: Lullaby - Helps you treat Tinnitus, a chronic health condition
nodes.author: Roberto GonzÃ¡lez

nodes.excerpt: We have created a motivating way for people to mix exercise and fun. It is a library of augmented reality games: Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, and Brick Breaker AR. Do pushups to play the games. Go play at playar.ai and earn your spot on the leaderboard!
nodes.title: PlayAR - Augmented reality games to get you moving

nodes.title: WellBuddy - Helping you find time to focus on your wellbeing at work
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Over 20% of females struggle with a hormone-related issue such as PCOS, endometriosis, or amenorrhea. Pollie is your friend at every step of your hormonal health journey, from finding your best-fit specialist to symptom tracking.
nodes.title: Pollie - Hormonal health, simplified
nodes.author: Jane Sagui

nodes.excerpt: Fluid is a simple & fun water tracking app that allows you to easily track how much you drink each day. To help you stay motivated, you can connect with your friends to see each other's daily progress.
nodes.title: Fluid - Track water and stay healthy with your friends
nodes.author: Christian Heine

nodes.excerpt: Our online eye exam makes it easy to get eye care from your couch. Visit our online eye clinic to quickly renew your glasses +/- contact lens prescriptions ($30,) or chat with a licensed eye doctor ($55)! Try here: https://www.quadranteye.com/ YC W21 Batch
nodes.title: Quadrant Eye - Renew your glasses and contact lens RX from your couch
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Smoothly prepared for Food Intolerance and Vegan Diets. Tasty and healthy smoothie recipes. It serves easy, gluten-free, lactose-free and nut-free recipes for users keen on their health.
nodes.title: Smoothly - Food intolerance and vegan diet recipes
nodes.author: Oktay ELÄ°PEK

nodes.excerpt: 100% of your meals show up via delivery service. They perfectly meet your macro and calorie targets. Rank your performance, hunger, and enjoyment and the service gets smarter. Save at least 3.5 hours per week. For most people, it saves 5+ hours per week.
nodes.title: Clockwork Nutrition - Perfect nutrition. Hot meals delivered. 100% automated.
nodes.author: Lee Knowlton

nodes.excerpt: Boostcamp is a free fitness education app for beginners of all levels. We partner with world-class coaches to create workout programs (at-home, gym, cardio) that are progression-based and customizable. Join Boostcamp to learn how to train, not just exercise.
nodes.title: Boostcamp - Free fitness education app for beginners
nodes.author: Pavlo Pedenko

nodes.excerpt: Global.health is a collaborative effort by technologists and researchers from leading international institutions to build a trusted, detailed, and accurate resource of real-time infectious disease data.
nodes.title: Global.health - Access data about 5M+ anonymized COVID-19 cases
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: We help GI clinics improve outcomes by sending patients information to their phones. For example, we send colonoscopy patients instructions that help them arrive prepared.
nodes.title: Gradia Health - Handcrafted healthcare information sent to patients' phones
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Back-to-back video calls stressing you out? Give yourself (and everyone else attending your next meeting) a chance to pause by adding a 2min guided audio meditation before entering the call. Works with whatever video software you use.
nodes.title: Mindful Meetings - Add a 2min guided meditation to any video link
nodes.author: Calvin Benton

nodes.excerpt: Mobile remote 1-on-1 coaching powered by video for precision feedback. Work with an elite coach who'll *see* your every workout and provide supportive guidance.
nodes.title: System2 - Video-powered 1-on-1 fitness coaching by elite trainers ğŸ’ª

nodes.excerpt: Everything you need to achieve your fitness goals: prefilled workout databases that are filterable by equipment & fitness levels, exercise & nutrition logging, calendars, and more.
nodes.title: HomeFitness OS - The all-in-one fitness system for Notion
nodes.author: Jake Brokaw

nodes.excerpt: HypeDocs is a web app that allows you to write down your accomplishments - personal or professional - throughout your day so they donâ€™t get lost or forgotten. Youâ€™ll get weekly reminders of past achievements, and can celebrate your wins with our community.
nodes.title: HypeDocs - Track achievements, gain confidence, beat imposter syndrome

nodes.excerpt: Your guide to better sex just got better: create your happiest, healthiest intimate life! Play using guided erotic exercises for more pleasure. Learn with science-based lessons. Connect deeply with your partner via our secure,facilitated chat. You're welcomeğŸ˜‰
nodes.title: Coral 2.0 - Better sex through a mix of science, stories and exercises

nodes.excerpt: Pocket self-care assistant that helps you stay positive and avoid negativity. JOI is a perfect tool for keeping a mood journal in a simple and funny way. Observe the correlation between your mood and activities during the day to see the patterns in your life.
nodes.title: JOI: Mood Tracker & Self-care Journal - A pocket self-care assistant that makes you feel happier

nodes.excerpt: Switch off. Slow down. Sundayy is the mindfulness based social network designed to be checked just once a week. Sundayy represents spending time away from feeds, thinking deeper about our days, and sharing what matters with the people who matter.

nodes.excerpt: Plan a full week of meals with a single click. Just tell us which foods you like, and how many calories, protein, fat, and carbs you want to eat. Swap out a meal, a day, or a week! We can fit in your treats, and even give you a grocery list!

nodes.excerpt: Hypnos is a digital sleep journal that helps you discover how your habits impact your sleep. It does this by taking in your mood, daily activities and pairing it with data from your sleep tracker. Delivering insights on how to improve your sleep and habits.
nodes.title: Hypnos - A sleep journal that helps you get better sleep.

nodes.excerpt: RecipeCart is a free extension that immediately shows you the recipe in a ready-for-print format. Print, save, or send the recipe to your phone. Under the hood, we use ML to identify exact ingredients + amounts for export to Instacart or Amazon Fresh.
nodes.title: Recipe Cart Chrome Extension - Instantly see recipe or order ingredients on any recipe site

nodes.excerpt: Onrise helps you to build nano habits and work more effectively. Standing on the latest research about behavior design and productivity, Onrise is your guide to achieve your goals. Give it a try and become the person you aspire to be!
nodes.title: Onrise - Build nano habits to become the person you aspire to be
nodes.author: Bruno Recht

nodes.excerpt: You have to be physically active if you want to live well and longer. Simon Says inspires you to do simple exercises during the day. Join us in the fight against sitting disease.
nodes.title: Simon Says - Activity Reminder for desk job

nodes.excerpt: "Every day, it gets a little easier. But you gotta do it every day, that's the hard part". Everyday helps you break goals down into tasks we can execute on every day, colouring our beautiful board whilst forming new habits, ultimately reaching our goals.

nodes.excerpt: Buddio is a mental health app to help support with depression, stress, and anxiety. Developed by software developers and psychologists based on the principles of science-backed therapies.
nodes.title: Buddio - Mental health for everyone

nodes.excerpt: IOON is an innovative technology that helps you turn drinking water into a sanitizer with help of silver particles. It is safe for kids, pets, people with allergies and can be even used on food. Itâ€™s portable, stylish and you can recycle it!
nodes.title: IOON - Smart device that turns water into sanitizer.

nodes.excerpt: Brainie uses music patterns to help your brain be more focused or relaxed. Designed for deep work to achieve flow or for relaxing sessions when you need to recharge. You can switch to different music patterns with different tempos to fit your needs.
nodes.title: Brainie - Music patterns to improve deep work, relaxation, and sleep.

nodes.excerpt: SnapSmile is an app that uses your eating habits + images of your teeth to provide you with the insights, and recommendations you need to improve your oral health at home. Think of SnapSmile like your own Dental Coach.

nodes.excerpt: Is Woofbuzz just another dog training app? No. It is a full platform that will provide answers to ALL of your canine queries. Yes, we provide free behavioral content, all originally illustrated, but Woofbuzz goes a lot further than this.
nodes.title: Woofbuzz - Provides tools to ensure your dogâ€™s daily needs are met

nodes.excerpt: Fastival is an intermittent fasting app which supports you to take breaks from eating to feel healthier and lose weight. Intermittent fasting boosts your immune system by giving your body time to digest food better and in turn strengthen the bodyâ€™s defenses.
nodes.title: Fastival - Discover the power of intermittent fasting
